video.title: Grojband
video.synopsis: Corey and his best friends will do anything to make their garage band a success. But his scheming older sister is determined to crush their dreams.

episodes.synopsis: The band's search for an "underground" sound awakens a sewer monster; After going vegan for a gig, Corey falls under the spell of a talking plant.
episodes.title: Monster of Rock / One-plant Band

episodes.synopsis: The band tries to impress a movie star during her premiere at the drive-in; A haunted amp and Corey's terrible lyrics raise zombies from the dead.
episodes.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Malt Balls / Dance of the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Corey asks an old pro for help with a scary campfire song contest; When the bandmates dress in bear costumes, Trina gets them locked up in the zoo.
episodes.title: Creep Away Camp / Zoohouse Rock

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to get new lyrics out of Trina, Corey enters her car in the demolition derby; A gig at the Queen Bee pageant is full of surprises.
episodes.title: Smash Up Terby / Queen Bee

episodes.synopsis: Corey's chickenpox-themed party sends the mayor into panic mode; Standing in for a band of puppets at a kids' show is harder than Grojband expected.
episodes.title: Pox N' Roll / No Strings Attached

episodes.synopsis: When Corey and the band make a crazy music video, they need strange lyrics to go with it, so they venture inside the surreal world of Trina's mind.
episodes.title: Dreamweaver Pt 1 / Dreamweaver Pt 2

episodes.synopsis: Corey enters the band in a car race with no rules; Kon's math grades create problems for the group when they book a gig at the Trymathelon.
episodes.title: In-D Road Racer / Math of Kon

episodes.synopsis: To score a sweet wedding gig, Corey has to prove he knows about love; The band's quest to sound perfect for the Swiss Expo unleashes an evil force.
episodes.title: All You Need is Cake / Helmet

episodes.synopsis: Corey accidentally sends a message to aliens while mowing a field for a concert; The band's hoedown gig hits a snag when Trina finds a genie in a jug.
episodes.title: Space Jammin / Wish Upon A Jug

episodes.synopsis: Corey and crew become superheroes so they can play kids' parties; On the wackiest day in Peaceville, Corey and his fellow minstrels upset a princess.
episodes.title: Super Zeroes / Knight to Remember

episodes.synopsis: The band's bid to rack up street cred creates chaos in Peaceville; Corey and company take up hair metal to play a dog show full of furry 'dos.
episodes.title: Line of Cred / Hair Today, Kon Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: Corey's pirate radio station rubs actual pirates the wrong way; The band time travels to find the next music trend and makes a startling discovery.
episodes.title: On The Air and Out To Sea/ Ahead of Our Tone

episodes.synopsis: The band visits the underworld to try to put an end to lame elevator music; Corey's new guitar has a dark side.
episodes.title: Love In A Nethervator / Six Strings of Evil

episodes.synopsis: Corey's amped-up workout song turns three grannies into hulking tyrants; The band discovers something evil is afoot at the local happiness festival.
episodes.title: Rocker Size / The Grin Reaper

episodes.synopsis: Grojband faces its top rival in an extreme Battle of the Bands; A Riffin-Mallory feud divides Peaceville after Corey sings the town's original anthem.
episodes.title: Rock the House / War and Peaceville

episodes.synopsis: The band clashes with a troupe of mimes over a prime spot in the park; Grojband's plan to do a mashup with the Newmans goes too far.
episodes.title: Myme Disease / Kon-Fusion

episodes.synopsis: After a shrink-ray mishap, Trina inhales a tiny Kon and the gang has to think fast; Corey's scheme to impress an audience of hipsters works too well.
episodes.title: Inn-Er Face / Who Are You?

episodes.synopsis: When the mayor bans bubbles, the band has to put the fizzy fun back in the Carbo-Nation festival; Laney unleashes her fury at the Lady Rage concert.
episodes.title: Pop Goes the Bubble / Girl, You’ll Be A Festival Soon

episodes.synopsis: A power-hungry Trina becomes mayor and bans Grojband, but the group fights back; Corey tries to fuse rocking and relaxing with a swingin' new lounge.
episodes.title: The Bandidate / It’s The Pirate Lounge For Me

episodes.synopsis: Corey's plan to wow the town with a hologram of Grojband doesn't go as expected; A viral video about a sneezing puppy earns the band powerful enemies.
episodes.title: Hologroj / The Snarffles with Sniffles

episodes.synopsis: Just as the band decides its specialty is shower music, Trina drains the town's water supply; A power outage inspires Corey to try an unplugged show.
episodes.title: Bee Bop a Loofa / A Capella Lips Now

episodes.synopsis: A device meant to give Grojband more soul hits the wrong target; Corey and Trina compete for the rights to a very special batch of jam.
episodes.title: Christina / That’s My Jam

episodes.synopsis: To buy the coolest cowboy hat ever, Corey must prove he's truly country; Grojband's bid to become a Valentine's Day sensation backfires.
episodes.title: For Hat And Country / It’s In the Card

episodes.synopsis: On their way to rock out on a mountain, Corey and friends meet the legendary Saxsquatch; Grojband's two biggest fans want Corey all to themselves.
episodes.title: Saxsquatch / Group Hug

episodes.synopsis: Trina sends a gnome to destroy the band's timing before a New Year's Eve gig; Corey faces a surprising rival in a guitar-playing video game contest.
episodes.title: Curse of the Metrognome / Dueling Buttons

episodes.synopsis: The twins tell Corey about an ancient prophecy that predicts Earth will be destroyed ... like, soon. Can Grojband find a way to save the planet?
episodes.title: Here Us Rock, Part 1 / Here Us Rock, Part 2
